description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家、美学家、思想史学家。曾任中国社会科学院研究员，被认为是1980年代中国大陆“新启蒙运动”的代表人物之一，是“美学热”启蒙思潮的引领者。因六四事件后受到批判，于1992年移居美国。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher, aesthetician, and intellectual historian. He was a researcher at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences and is considered a key figure in the 'New Enlightenment' movement of the 1980s in mainland China, leading the 'aesthetics fever'. After being criticized following the Tiananmen Square incident, he moved to the United States in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Li Zehou.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚的逝世地。
description.en: Place of death of Li Zehou.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾就读的中学。
description.en: A high school that Li Zehou attended.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾就读的师范学院。
description.en: A normal college that Li Zehou attended.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚毕业的大学。
description.en: The university from which Li Zehou graduated.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚的母亲。
description.en: Li Zehou's mother.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚的高祖，湘军高级将领。
description.en: Li Zehou's great-grandfather, a senior general in the Xiang Army.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚的父亲，邮政局高级职员。
description.en: Li Zehou's father, a senior employee at the postal bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性美学学术团体。
description.en: A national academic society for aesthetics in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的哲学社会科学研究机构。
description.en: The national academy for philosophy and social sciences in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国科学院哲学研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院哲学研究所

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾工作的研究机构，后并入中国社会科学院。
description.en: A research institute where Li Zehou worked, later incorporated into the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国科罗拉多州的私立文理学院，李泽厚曾在此任教。
description.en: A private liberal arts college in Colorado, USA, where Li Zehou taught.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人大教育科学文化卫生委员会

zh-cn: 全国人大教育科学文化卫生委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代在中国大陆发生的思想解放运动，李泽厚是其代表人物之一。
description.en: An intellectual liberation movement in mainland China during the 1980s, of which Li Zehou was a representative figure.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代在中国大陆兴起的社会文化思潮，关注美学和艺术。
description.en: A socio-cultural trend that emerged in mainland China in the 1980s, focusing on aesthetics and art.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由曾国藩组建的以湖南人为主的军队。
description.en: A military force in the late Qing dynasty, primarily composed of Hunanese and organized by Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期的政治家、战略家、理学家、文学家，湘军的创立者和统帅。
description.en: A statesman, strategist, philosopher, and writer of the late Qing dynasty, founder and commander of the Xiang Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名作家，新文化运动的领袖之一。
description.en: A prominent modern Chinese writer and a leading figure in the New Culture Movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代著名作家、诗人、翻译家。
description.en: A renowned modern Chinese writer, poet, and translator.

description.zh-cn: 中国南宋时期豪放派词人。
description.en: A Chinese poet of the Southern Song dynasty, known for his ci poetry.

description.zh-cn: 由卡尔·马克思和弗里德里希·恩格斯创立的理论体系。
description.en: A theoretical system founded by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家、哲学史家，李泽厚在北京大学的老师。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher and historian of philosophy, who was Li Zehou's teacher at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家、宗教史家，李泽厚在北京大学的老师。
description.en: A Chinese philosopher and historian of religion, who was Li Zehou's teacher at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代中国大陆的一场大规模文化讨论和反思运动。
description.en: A large-scale cultural discussion and reflection movement in mainland China during the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 中国20世纪70年代末至80年代初兴起的一个诗歌流派。
description.en: A school of Chinese poetry that emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 中国当代艺术史上的一个前卫艺术团体。
description.en: An avant-garde art group in the history of contemporary Chinese art.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的政治事件。
description.en: A political event that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国文学评论家，曾与李泽厚一同参与六四事件期间的呼吁，并合著《告别革命》。
description.en: A Chinese literary critic who joined Li Zehou in an appeal during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests and co-authored 'Farewell to Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、记者，曾与李泽厚一同参与六四事件期间的呼吁。
description.en: A Chinese author and journalist who joined Li Zehou in an appeal during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治学家、社会活动家，曾与李泽厚一同参与六四事件期间的呼吁。
description.en: A Chinese political scientist and social activist who joined Li Zehou in an appeal during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚提出的一个重要思想观点，主张以改良主义代替暴力革命。
description.en: An important intellectual viewpoint proposed by Li Zehou, advocating for reformism over violent revolution.

nodes.id: 告别革命：回望二十世纪中国

zh-cn: 告别革命：回望二十世纪中国

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚与刘再复的对话录，系统阐述了“告别革命”的思想。
description.en: A record of dialogues between Li Zehou and Liu Zaifu, systematically elaborating on the idea of 'Farewell to Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 著名历史学家，曾高度评价李泽厚的思想贡献。
description.en: A renowned historian who highly praised Li Zehou's intellectual contributions.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治意识形态和社会组织形式。
description.en: A political ideology and form of social organization.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家，对李泽厚的“告别革命”说提出过质疑。
description.en: A Chinese historian who questioned Li Zehou's theory of 'Farewell to Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾就读的中学。
description.en: A high school that Li Zehou attended.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚于1930年6月13日出生于湖北汉口。
description.en: Li Zehou was born in Hankou, Hubei on June 13, 1930.

description.zh-cn: 1942年，李泽厚考入宁乡靳江中学（后称宁乡四中）。
description.en: In 1942, Li Zehou was admitted to Jinjiang Middle School in Ningxiang (later known as Ningxiang No. 4 High School).

description.zh-cn: 1945年秋，李泽厚考上湖南省立第一中学（现长沙市第一中学）。
description.en: In the autumn of 1945, Li Zehou was admitted to Hunan Provincial First Middle School (now Changsha No. 1 High School).

description.zh-cn: 由于经济原因，李泽厚于1945年转入有公费补助的湖南第一师范学院，并于1948年毕业。
description.en: Due to financial reasons, Li Zehou transferred to the publicly funded Hunan First Normal University in 1945 and graduated in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 1950年，李泽厚考入北京大学哲学系，1954年毕业。
description.en: In 1950, Li Zehou was admitted to the Department of Philosophy at Peking University, graduating in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 陶懋兰是李泽厚的母亲。
description.en: Tao Maolan was Li Zehou's mother.

description.zh-cn: 李进是李泽厚的父亲。
description.en: Li Jin was Li Zehou's father.

description.zh-cn: 李朝斌是李泽厚的高祖。
description.en: Li Chaobin was Li Zehou's great-grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾担任中华美学学会副会长。
description.en: Li Zehou once served as the Vice President of the Chinese Society for Aesthetics.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾担任中国社会科学院研究员。
description.en: Li Zehou served as a researcher at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

relationships.target: 中国科学院哲学研究所

description.zh-cn: 1955年，李泽厚被分配至中国科学院哲学研究所工作。
description.en: In 1955, Li Zehou was assigned to work at the Institute of Philosophy, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

position.en: Deputy to the 7th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾任第七届全国人大代表。
description.en: Li Zehou served as a deputy to the 7th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人大教育科学文化卫生委员会

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚曾任第七届全国人大教育科学文化卫生委员会委员。
description.en: Li Zehou served as a member of the 7th Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚移居美国后，曾任教于美国科罗拉多学院。
description.en: After moving to the United States, Li Zehou taught at Colorado College.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚被认为是1980年代中国大陆“新启蒙运动”的代表人物之一。
description.en: Li Zehou is considered one of the representative figures of the 'New Enlightenment' movement in mainland China in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚于1980年底发表《美的历程》，引领了“美学热”思潮。
description.en: At the end of 1980, Li Zehou published 'The Path of Beauty', leading the 'aesthetics fever' trend.

description.zh-cn: “美学热”成为“文化热”和新启蒙运动的先导。
description.en: The 'aesthetics fever' became a precursor to the 'Culture Fever' and the New Enlightenment movement.

description.zh-cn: “美学热”成为“文化热”和新启蒙运动的先导。
description.en: The 'aesthetics fever' became a precursor to the 'Culture Fever' and the New Enlightenment movement.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚的高祖李朝斌是湘军高级将领。
description.en: Li Zehou's great-grandfather, Li Chaobin, was a senior general in the Xiang Army.

position.en: Battalion and Sentry Officer of the naval force

description.zh-cn: 李朝斌初为曾国藩水师的营哨官。
description.en: Li Chaobin initially served as a battalion and sentry officer in Zeng Guofan's naval force.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚在中学时期最爱读鲁迅的作品。
description.en: During his middle school years, Li Zehou loved reading Lu Xun's works the most.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚在中学时期最爱读冰心的作品。
description.en: During his middle school years, Li Zehou loved reading Bing Xin's works.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚在中学时期最喜爱辛弃疾的诗词。
description.en: During his middle school years, Li Zehou's favorite poetry was by Xin Qiji.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚在湖南第一师范学院就读期间接触了马克思主义。
description.en: Li Zehou came into contact with Marxism while studying at Hunan First Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 在北京大学就读期间，冯友兰是与李泽厚交往最深的老师之一。
description.en: While studying at Peking University, Feng Youlan was one of the teachers with whom Li Zehou had the deepest interactions.

description.zh-cn: 在北京大学就读期间，任继愈是与李泽厚交往最深的老师之一。
description.en: While studying at Peking University, Ren Jiyu was one of the teachers with whom Li Zehou had the deepest interactions.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚是当时最早公开支持朦胧诗的美学家，并于1981年发文为其辩护。
description.en: Li Zehou was one of the first aestheticians to publicly support the Misty Poets at the time, publishing an article in their defense in 1981.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚于1981年发表文章《画廊谈美》，为“星星画展”进行辩护。
description.en: In 1981, Li Zehou published the article 'Discussing Aesthetics in the Gallery', defending the 'Stars Art Exhibition'.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年六四事件期间，与刘再复等人共同发表《我们对今天局势的紧急呼吁》。后与刘再复合著《告别革命》。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he, along with Liu Zaifu and others, jointly issued 'Our Urgent Appeal Regarding the Current Situation'. He later co-authored 'Farewell to Revolution' with Liu Zaifu.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年六四事件期间，与戴晴等人共同发表《我们对今天局势的紧急呼吁》。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he, along with Dai Qing and others, jointly issued 'Our Urgent Appeal Regarding the Current Situation'.

description.zh-cn: 在1989年六四事件期间，与严家其等人共同发表《我们对今天局势的紧急呼吁》。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, he, along with Yan Jiaqi and others, jointly issued 'Our Urgent Appeal Regarding the Current Situation'.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，李泽厚的作品被禁，本人也受到批判，并被禁止离境。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, Li Zehou's works were banned, he was criticized, and he was forbidden from leaving the country.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，李泽厚受到中共和共产党人批判。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square incident, Li Zehou was criticized by the Communist Party of China and its members.

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚提出的“告别革命”说为1980年代的文化热划上了一个句号。
description.en: The 'Farewell to Revolution' theory proposed by Li Zehou brought an end to the 'Culture Fever' of the 1980s.

relationships.target: 告别革命：回望二十世纪中国

description.zh-cn: 李泽厚与刘再复合著了对话录《告别革命：回望二十世纪中国》。
description.en: Li Zehou co-authored the dialogue record 'Farewell to Revolution: Looking Back at 20th-Century China' with Liu Zaifu.

relationships.target: 告别革命：回望二十世纪中国

description.zh-cn: 刘再复与李泽厚合著了对话录《告别革命：回望二十世纪中国》，并由刘再复执笔。
description.en: Liu Zaifu co-authored the dialogue record 'Farewell to Revolution: Looking Back at 20th-Century China' with Li Zehou, with Liu being the primary writer.

description.zh-cn: 汉学家余英时曾评价李泽厚使得一整代中国青年知识分子从共产主义的意识形态之中解放了出来。
description.en: Sinologist Yu Yingshi commented that Li Zehou liberated an entire generation of young Chinese intellectuals from communist ideology.

description.zh-cn: 根据余英时的评价，李泽厚的思想使得一整代中国青年知识分子从共产主义的意识形态之中解放了出来。
description.en: According to Yu Yingshi's evaluation, Li Zehou's thought liberated an entire generation of young Chinese intellectuals from communist ideology.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学教授秦晖对李泽厚的“告别革命”说持怀疑态度。
description.en: Tsinghua University professor Qin Hui was skeptical of Li Zehou's 'Farewell to Revolution' theory.
